title: Effect of Environmental Performance and Environmental Costs on Financial Performance with CSR Disclosure as Intervening Variables
creators: [{'id': None, 'name': {'lineage': None, 'family': 'Derila', 'honourific': None, 'given': 'Cindy Pratama'}}, {'name': {'given': 'Einde', 'lineage': None, 'family': 'Evana', 'honourific': None}, 'id': None}, {'name': {'given': 'Fajar Gustiawaty', 'family': 'Dewi', 'lineage': None, 'honourific': None}, 'id': 'fajargd@yahoo.com'}]
publication: International Journal for Innovation Education and Research
abstract: This research is a conceptual paper that aims to determine the effect of researchers will examine the effect of Environmental Performance and Environmental Costs on Financial Performance with CSR as an Intervening variable on mining companies listed on the Exchange Indonesian Securities and participated in the 2015-2018 PROPER. This research is expected to be used as a material consideration in making policies concerning environmental performance and as a tool to measure financial performance for the progress of the company. In addition to being taken into consideration, researchers hope that this research can be used to help in making investment decisions in the company as an evaluation material.

title: Regional Management Information System and Training for Regional Financial Accountability
creators: [{'id': None, 'name': {'honourific': None, 'lineage': None, 'family': 'Rahmawati', 'given': 'Yannisa'}}, {'name': {'lineage': None, 'family': 'Dewi', 'honourific': None, 'given': 'Fajar Gustiawaty'}, 'id': 'fajargd@yahoo.com'}, {'id': None, 'name': {'lineage': None, 'family': 'Yuliansyah', 'honourific': None, 'given': 'Yuliansyah'}}]
publication: International Journal for Innovation Education and Research
abstract: Financial accountability is the responsibility for financial management in the form of financial reports through the use of information technology, which is expected to be able to support regional governments in carrying out better regional financial management as well as having competent human resources in their management. This study aims to provide information about the usefulness of information technology and human resource competence in the accountability region financial report. This research was conducted in three regional expansion in Lampung Province with a descriptive qualitative method with the help of NVivo software for data analysts. The result showed that to achieve regional financial accountability is supported by utilizing information technology in the form of a regional management information system, while to be able to operate the SIMDA application program require adequate human resource and training is given to increase competence.
